chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Set) (P : Pred A) (S : Pred B) (f : A -> B), (forall a : A, P a -> S (f a)) -> forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL B S (map f l)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%
Pred = fun A : Set => A -> Prop : Set -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
ExistsL : forall A : Set, Pred A -> list A -> Set
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
ExistsL_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
FoundE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), P a -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
SearchE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
GoodR_sind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rect : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rec : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_ind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
monExistsL1 : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs : list A), ExistsL A P bs -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs)
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
monExistsL : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs cs : list A), ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs) -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> In (f x) (map f l)
count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), count_occ decA l x = count_occ decB (map f l) (f x)
prod_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A * B -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (b : B), P (a, b)) -> forall p : A * B, P p
NoDup_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), NoDup (map f l) -> NoDup l
map_nth : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), nth n (map f l) (f d) = f (nth n l d)
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (map f l) n = Some (f d)
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Set), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
map_length : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), length (map f l) = length l
flat_map_concat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l : list A), flat_map f l = concat (map f l)
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
map_rev : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f (rev l) = rev (map f l)
